name: Development Tools
description: Tools for coding, software development, testing, and deployment

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: Web-based platform for version control and collaborative software development using Git.

tools.name: Visual Studio Code
tools.description: Free, open-source code editor with support for debugging, syntax highlighting, and extensions.

tools.name: Postman
tools.description: API development environment for designing, testing, and documenting APIs.

tools.name: Docker
tools.description: Platform for developing, shipping, and running applications using containerization.

tools.name: Netlify
tools.description: Platform for deploying and hosting modern web applications with continuous deployment.

tools.name: Vercel
tools.description: Frontend cloud platform for static sites and serverless functions with instant deployment.

tools.name: Stack Overflow
tools.description: Question and answer community for programmers and developers to share knowledge.

tools.name: CodePen
tools.description: Online code editor and community for front-end developers to showcase HTML, CSS, and JS.

tools.name: Jira
tools.description: Issue tracking and project management tool for agile software development teams.
